name: Easy Beef Samosas
author: Joliecathy
summary: Here are some really easy-to-make samosas, which will be ready to serve in no time. Serve them with the sauce of your choice, such as mango chutney, coriander chutney, or even raita. They can be frozen easily before frying; simply defrost at room temperature and then fry as stated.
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook beef, onion, shallot, and thyme until meat is brown throughout and crumbly, about 5 minutes
Season with curry powder, salt, and pepper
Lay a sheet of phyllo dough on a work surface and cut it lengthways into thirds
Add a spoonful of meat mixture at the top of each strip and fold into triangles, pressing samosa edges together with moistened fingers
Heat oil in a deep fryer or skillet to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Deep fry samosas in batches until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes each
